# Repository Description

**ECL — Entity-Context-Linking**: A Mixture-of-Experts extraction pipeline that transforms unstructured enterprise documents into AI-ready knowledge graphs. Enables AI agents to reason over business knowledge with full traceability and zero cloud LLM cost.

## Key Features

- **5 Domain-Specialized MoE Experts**: Contract, Equipment, Financial Risk, Opportunity, Healthcare extraction
- **Hallucination-Free**: Source-text validation + confidence guardrails (≥0.70)
- **Local LLM**: Zero-cost pipeline via Ollama (llama3:8b) — no cloud APIs
- **FalkorDB Graph**: Typed entities, weighted relationships, Cypher queries
- **Full Traceability**: Audit trail + validation metrics per entity
- **Low-Code Builder**: ECL Studio UI for exploration and configuration
- **Enterprise Ready**: Connectors for SharePoint, Dynamics 365, ServiceNow

Python 3.10+ | Ollama (llama3:8b) | FalkorDB | Cypher | Streamlit | HTML/Canvas
